title: Nerd Club — Researcher Community Platform
description: Nerd Club is a modern, interactive platform designed for researchers to ask questions, share insights, and engage with a like-minded research community. Built with Next.js, MongoDB, and NextAuth, it provides a fast, secure, and seamless user experience.
challenges: Implementing real-time updates for community interactions
Optimizing database queries for fast performance
Managing user authentication and authorization securely
improvements: Add advanced search and filtering capabilities
Create mobile application for better accessibility

title: GameHub – Retro Gaming Platform
description: GameHub is a modern retro-styled gaming platform built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase. It features fast routing, secure authentication, smooth animations, game listings, and an immersive UI inspired by classic arcade themes.
challenges: Creating responsive retro UI across devices
Implementing smooth game loading without lag
Managing game states and user progress
improvements: Expand game library with more titles
